client.model

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.model.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Joe Eklund The map class represents the game board and everything on it. This includes hexes, ports, roads, settlements, cities, the radius of the board, and the robber.
